short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access exclusive coupon codes and discounts across 100,000 retailers. Savings automatically applied at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the world's largest coupon code extension and start saving today. 100% free. 

Shop Mail sources millions of coupon codes and automatically applies the best discount for you whenever you make a purchase online. Food delivery, fashion, travel...we've got them all covered and more.

üí∞ 1.2 million codes across 100,000 sites
Shop Mail has 5x more deals than any other coupon code extension. Our only focus is getting you the best possible deal, wherever you shop.

‚ö°Ô∏è Cycle through the best codes in seconds
As soon as you land on a checkout page, we automatically try all coupons within a matter of seconds so that you never have to wait. 

ü™Ñ Browse through hundreds of new deals
Interested in finding new deals? Simply open the Shop Mail extension and browse through hundreds of our top new coupon codes across different sites. 

Shop Mail is available on Chrome. Start saving today for free!
